# AVCaptureDevice.MicrophoneMode.wideSpectrum

**Case**

A mode that minimizes microphone audio processing to capture all sounds in the room.

## Declaration

```swift
case wideSpectrum
```

## Microphone modes

- **AVCaptureDevice.MicrophoneMode.standard**: A mode that processes microphone audio with standard voice DSP.
- **AVCaptureDevice.MicrophoneMode.voiceIsolation**: A mode that processes microphone audio to isolate the voice and attenuate other signals.
